messages.title: On Your Side
messages.content: To get Brexit sorted in six months, safeguard our NHS, kick-start a Green Industrial Revolution, and rebuild our public services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Get Brexit Sorted in Six Months
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will sort Brexit in six months.
Labour pledges to safeguard our NHS.
Labour will kick-start a Green Industrial Revolution.
Labour commits to rebuild our public services.

mentions.candidate: Cat Smith has been standing up for Lancaster and Fleetwood since 2015.
mentions.tacticalSituation: This constituency is a two horse race between Labour and the Tories.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit sorted in six months.
issues.economy: Plans for more jobs, higher wages and investing in our future.
issues.education: Ending cuts to our schools and colleges.
issues.environment: Tackling the climate crisis with a Green Industrial Revolution.
issues.health: Protecting our NHS from a Trump trade deal.

leaflet.personalStatement: Cat has always put our community first, and as a strong, local voice, Cat has always been on your side.

politicalExperience.achievements: Standing up for Lancaster and Fleetwood

quotes.text: Cat Smith is a fantastic MP and has been an absolute champion for Lancaster and Fleetwood.

images.caption: Cat Smith with people and Labour supporters.
